item.title: Dive Into World Suicide Data
item.description: Project Motivation As someone who absolutely loves life, I wanted to explore what were some of the main driving mechanisms behind suicide and what can be done with the data Project Source WHO Suicide Statistics Key Findings Even though some of the highest suicide numbers reported are in Russia, United States, and Japan, the suicide % rate per capita is the highest for Lithuania, Hungary, and Russia as can be seen in the following figure: The study would have been more comprehensive if data from China and India were included.
